descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]
Hello! this is only a simple Character Preset for RaceMenu
no skills or power like the NPC Miraak, just my own version of Miraak without mask.[/size][/center]

[size=6]Requirements:[/size]

[size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdo's[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192]Eyes of Aber[/url][/size]

[size=6]Recommended:[/size]
[size=3]Dragonborn DLC for Miraak's Armor Set[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905]AddItemMenu - Ultimate...[/url][/size] [size=3]for quick access to Miraak's Armor Set[/size]

[size=6]Installation:[/size]

[size=3]Step-1. Download my mod and place it at Data/SKSE/plugins/CharGen/Presets

[size=3]Step-[/size]2. Start Skyrim using SKSE loader

[size=3]Step-[/size]3. Load any working save file or start a newgame

[size=3]Step-[/size]4. Open the console " ~ "

[size=3]Step-[/size]5. Type "showracemenu"

[size=3]Step-[/size]6. Select the Nord Race. (if you dont want to be a Nord choose other Race, then use "Sculpt" inside RaceMenu then click
    "Import Head" choose Miraak V1 or V2 Head do this after "Step-7".)

[size=3]Step-[/size]7. Look for "Preset" inside RaceMenu

[size=3]Step-[/size]8. Press F9, then click Miraak V1 or V2 Presets

[size=3]Step-[/size]9. Play! have fun... :D
[/size]
author: iPresets
